name: Two Minute Mystery
description:
Description:

You're sent a message. A murder has taken place down at 21 Hillside Avenue.

Something is out of place. Is the witness lying, or telling the truth?

Spot the clues and discover the contradictions in this two minute mystery.

Specifications: Minimum Requirements Download Executable Version

Language: English
Keyboard Layout: QWERTY based (US)
Operating System: Windows

Browser Version

WebGL HTML5

Game Jam:

A game entry for Blind-Jam; https://itch.io/jam/blind-jam

GameJam Theme: Must be accessible for blind players, and supported on Windows OS

Credits:

Adapted from a short story:
Two Minute Mysteries by Donald J. Sobol
ISBN: 0-590-41292-2

Text to Speech:
IBM Watson - American English: Allison (voice)
